name: Find the hidden JAM
description:
A godot 2d platformer made in 1.5 days, where you need to collect the hidden JAMs.

But you can collect those jams anyway, because why not.

Including: Junky ideas, Arbitrary level-design, Mostly-useless tiles. 

Also including: Huge hitbox, Crappy art, Bad gameplay and stuff.

Estimated play time: 15-60 min

Edited: added walkthrough
